TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/StartPanel/PlaceList extends System.Object
public: ref class VisualStyleElement::StartPanel::PlaceList abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Provides a for the background of the right side of the **Start** menu. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.PlaceList.Normal%2A> proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.PlaceList> classe restituisce un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> che rappresenta lo sfondo del lato destro del **Start** menu.
## Examples Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come creare un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> con il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> restituito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.PlaceList.Normal%2A> proprietà. Per eseguire questo esempio, incollarlo in un Windows Form. Gestire il modulo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> evento e chiamare il `DrawVisualStyleElementStartPanelPlaceList1` metodo dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> gestione degli eventi, passando `e` come <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#221](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#221)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#221](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#221)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Normal As VisualStyleElement

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents the background of the right side of the **Start** menu.
Docs.value: Oggetto che rappresenta lo sfondo del lato destro del * * inizio * * menu.

remarks.format:
## Remarks È possibile usare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> restituito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.PlaceList.Normal%2A> proprietà per creare un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come creare un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> con il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> restituito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.StartPanel.PlaceList.Normal%2A> proprietà. Per eseguire questo esempio, incollarlo in un Windows Form. Gestire il modulo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> evento e chiamare il `DrawVisualStyleElementStartPanelPlaceList1` metodo dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> gestione degli eventi, passando `e` come <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#221](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#221)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#221](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#221)]
